text: Myrceugenia kleinii is a species of plant in the family Myrtaceae. The plant is endemic to the Atlantic Forest ecoregion in southeastern Brazil. ==References== kleinii Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Atlantic Forest (biome) Category:Flora of Santa Catarina (state) Category:Flora of São Paulo (state) Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Myrceugenia kleinii
